title: Here begynneth a treatyse of a galau[n]t
author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?, attributed name.
publisher: In the Flete strete at the [sygne of t]he sonne, by Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
The British Library fragment is in a different setting from the Huntington copy. Cf. "The Library", Sept. 1993, p. 181-2.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
